location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 815/1917 Pt 6 'Persian Gulf:- Lighting & Buoying. Inter-Departmental Conference 1923. Capt. N.F.J. Wilson.'

mods.abstract: This part relates to an interdepartmental conference on lighting and buoying in the Persian Gulf, with Captain Neville Frederick Jarvis Wilson of the Royal Indian Marine agreeing to represent the Secretary of State for India.The part mainly consists of received letters from Wilson discussing arrangements for the conference, including expenses. Also included are draft India Office replies to Wilson.
